column2: Alpha Black, this is Papa Bear. We see you're on the beach with your mission package. Objectives accomplished, mission complete. Out.
We're over here, guys. It's damn good to see you. We lost three of our best guys during the last hour, including our medic. Ivan is combing the area, looking for us. Let's get the hell out of here.
Edwards, SEAL, at a NW Rugen beach.
